about_the_game:
Dive into a dark, supernatural world in this survival Dystopian RPG, where the city is under the grip of dark entities controlling AI machines. Harness solar power and the environment to fuel your equipment, engage in intense combat, and build defenses. Reclaim the city from the shadows.

Key Features


  • Discovery Gameplay

Embark on a journey through an urban labyrinth in a game that offers open-ended exploration. You have the freedom to immerse yourself in the lore or simply focus on survival in a world that changes every playthrough. Cultivate your survival skills by farming, trading with NPCs and factions in real time, recruiting allies, and scavenging for items. Guide Seven and Sanity, your protagonists, as they navigate a dystopian city riddled with abandoned towers and dynamically generated events.

  • Player vs Environment
Engage in strategic combat or opt for stealth to evade threats in a hostile Real Time environment. Scourge the city for limited resources to stand your ground against machines, hostile human factions, and supernatural entities.

  • Real-Time Solar Gameplay
Experience a game that unfolds in real-time, allowing you to harness environmental elements like sunlight. Survive the daylight hours by maximizing solar power storage.

  • A.I. Companion Management
Sanity is a powerful A.I. Companion that can Fabricate Weapons and equipment given the right materials and energy. Travel with your A.I. Companion Sanity and maintain his energy levels to ensure his assistance throughout your journey.

  • Equipment and Weapon Development
Leverage your scavenged items to Development weapons and equipment with the assistance of your A.I. companion, Sanity. Utilize solar power to charge your gear and gain an edge against the myriad challenges of the environment. Materialize weapons into reality using you A.I. companion.

  • Inventory Management
Utilize Sanity's storage capabilities for your synthetic equipment and items. For organic materials, you'll need to rely on traditional storage methods, such as a backpack.

  • Skills and Combat Abilities
Enhance the combat effectiveness of Seven and Sanity by improving their skills. Elevating your skillset is crucial to boosting your survival odds.

  • Seed System
Embrace agriculture by growing food in solar pods. Cultivate herbal medicines and fruits for trade with NPCs or to Consume them.

name: The END of Sanity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11

short_description: A hack and slash dystopian survival RPG with real time resource gathering mechanics and A.I. that hunt you down.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
